languages.text: "Пособники пиратов, вы опознаны и будете подвергнуты имперскому правосудию!" {n}Вокс разражается громким треском, словно его швырнули об стену.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Спикер — PiratesVsNavy_admiral_name
старт боя — мы за Пиратов

Спикер — PiratesVsNavy_admiral_name
старт боя — мы за Пиратов

languages.text: "Pirate sympathisers, you have been identified and will be held to Imperial justice!" {n}The vox-caster emits a loud crack as if it had been thrown against a wall.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пособники пиратов, вы опознаны и будете подвергнуты имперскому правосудию!" {n}Вокс разражается громким треском, словно его швырнули об стену.{/n}

languages.text: "Piratensympathisanten, Ihr wurdet identifiziert und werdet imperiale Gerechtigkeit erfahren." {n}Aus dem Vox-Transmitter ertönt ein lautes Knacken, als hätte ihn jemand gegen eine Wand geschleudert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pirate sympathisers, you have been identified and will be held to Imperial justice!" {n}The vox-caster emits a loud crack as if it had been thrown against a wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Piratensympathisanten, Ihr wurdet identifiziert und werdet imperiale Gerechtigkeit erfahren." {n}Aus dem Vox-Transmitter ertönt ein lautes Knacken, als hätte ihn jemand gegen eine Wand geschleudert.{/n}

languages.text: « Avis aux sympathisants des pirates, vous avez été démasqués et vous répondrez de vos crimes devant la justice impériale ! » {n}L'émetteur vox crache un craquement sonore, comme si on l'avait projeté contre un mur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pirate sympathisers, you have been identified and will be held to Imperial justice!" {n}The vox-caster emits a loud crack as if it had been thrown against a wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Avis aux sympathisants des pirates, vous avez été démasqués et vous répondrez de vos crimes devant la justice impériale ! » {n}L'émetteur-vox crache un craquement sonore, comme si on l'avait projeté contre un mur.{/n}

languages.text: «Simpatizantes de los piratas, ¡habéis sido identificados y responderéis ante la justicia del Imperium!». {n}El voco amplificador emite un sonoro crujido, como si alguien lo hubiera lanzado contra la pared.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pirate sympathisers, you have been identified and will be held to Imperial justice!" {n}The vox-caster emits a loud crack as if it had been thrown against a wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Simpatizantes de los piratas, ¡habéis sido identificados y responderéis ante la justicia del Imperium!». {n}El voco amplificador emite un sonoro crujido, como si alguien lo hubiera lanzado contra la pared.{/n}

languages.text: 「海賊のシンパども、お前たちの正体はすでに判明しており、これより帝国の正義を下す！」{n}音声通信送受信装置が、壁にでも投げつけられたかのような大きな音を発する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pirate sympathisers, you have been identified and will be held to Imperial justice!" {n}The vox-caster emits a loud crack as if it had been thrown against a wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「海賊のシンパども、お前たちの正体はすでに判明しており、これより帝国の正義を下す！」{n}音声通信送受信装置が、壁にでも投げつけられたかのような大きな音を発する。{/n}

languages.text: “你们这些同情海盗的人！准备接受帝国的审判吧！”{n}通讯器发出一声巨响，听起来像是被扔到了墙上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pirate sympathisers, you have been identified and will be held to Imperial justice!" {n}The vox-caster emits a loud crack as if it had been thrown against a wall.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你们这些同情海盗的人！准备接受帝国的审判吧！”{n}通讯器发出一声巨响，听起来像是被扔到了墙上。{/n}

languages.text: "Korsan sempatizanları, kimliğiniz tespit edildi ve İmparatorluk adaletiyle yargılanacaksınız!" {n}Voksyayardan, duvara fırlatılmış gibi yüksek seste bir çatırtı yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Pirate sympathisers, you have been identified and will be held to Imperial justice!" {n}The vox-caster emits a loud crack as if it had been thrown against a wall.{/n}
